bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of yi bing 疫病 , 疫病 , epidemic disease, with papules, swelling and sores, and sometimes bleeding. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 2: 蒲黃湯，療傷寒温病，天行疫毒 , “Decoction with pu huang : to cure harm caused by cold and warmth disease, and heaven-sent epidemic poison ”. Yi e 噫呃 , hiccough [2]

Illness Sign identical with e ni 呃逆①, hiccough with adverse movement of qi. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren shen 人參 quotes TPSHF: 多食則吐，氣引前後，噫呃不除 , “Eaten in large quantities it causes vomiting, with qi pulling on the front and back. [Patients experience] hiccough and are unable to relieve themselves of [what appears to be stuck in their body]”.
